properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for signing JWT tokens. Should be set via JWT_SECRET environment variable.

properties.name: app.jwt.expiration-ms
properties.description: JWT token expiration time in milliseconds. Default: 86400000 (24 hours)

properties.name: gemini.api.key
properties.description: API key for Gemini AI service. Should be set via GEMINI_API_KEY environment variable.
